categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A male Twi'lek Jedi served the Jedi Order and the Galactic Republic prior to the outbreak of the Mandalorian Wars. At some point, he arrested a bounty hunter named Valius Ying with the assistance of Republic captain Saul Karath. As a Jedi, the Twi'lek was sensitive to the Force and used a lightsaber with a green crystal. He also had green skin.
The Twi'lek Jedi first appeared in the fourth issue of the Star Wars: Knights of the Old Republic: War miniseries. He was created by John Jackson Miller and penciled by Andrea Mutti.
